name: RTS Battle
description:
YOUR GOAL: Destroy the Enemy Throne as quickly as possible!

- Build units from your Barracks
- Move units via intuitive touch controls
- Find the best attack angles and formations
- Smartly move injured units to the back
- Come up with new strategies
- Replay Missions to beat your best times


ARCHERS:
- Attack Range: Medium
- Armor: Medium
- Movement: Fast

HORSEMEN:
- Attack Range: Short (melee)
- Armor: High
- Movement: Very Fast

CATAPULTS:
- Attack Range: Far
- Armor: Low
- Movement: Slow
